title: Add richer dummy content and fix hints initial reveal behavior

requirements.text: Expand the in-app static dataset so the UI looks populated and presentable across Books, Topics, Question Detail, and Saved Questions views.

quotes: Please add dummy data so it looks good

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/lib/data.ts` contains enough sample content to make all core screens feel populated (multiple books, multiple sections per book, and multiple topics per section).

Sample topics include realistic values for `meta`, `description`, and at least some topics include `content`, `hints`, and `solution` so that the Question Detail view shows each section with meaningful content.
Book summary fields (`sections`, `topics`) match the actual number of sections/topics in the dataset so counts shown on the Books page are accurate.
No user-facing placeholder text is non-English.

requirements.text: Fix the Hints expansion UX so that when the user expands the Hints section for the first time, the first hint content is revealed immediately along with the controls (Show Next Hint / Show All / Hide All), rather than showing only the buttons with no hint text.

quotes: also for hints when i try to expand first it shows me show next hint, show all etc button but it should show me the hint na and with the buttons to show next hint show all and hide all etc

acceptanceCriteria: When expanding the Hints collapsible (in `frontend/src/components/QuestionSections.tsx`), the first hint is visible immediately without requiring an extra click.
The controls (Show Next Hint / Show All / Hide All) still function correctly after the change (can reveal more hints, reveal all, and hide all).
The initial expanded hints state no longer matches the behavior shown in the uploaded screenshot (buttons only, no hint content).
No regressions: topics with `hints.length === 0` do not render the Hints section (current behavior remains).

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, `frontend/src/components/ui`.
Use English for all user-facing text.
nonGoals: Adding a backend API or persistence layer for books/topics/hints/solutions (dummy content should remain frontend static data).
Changing authentication or Internet Identity flows.
